content: How does the "supported only" filter work? Crucible ran against our servers last night and is reporting a 2% pass rate, because it ran a whole bunch of suites against resource types that aren't included in our conformance resources

It is supposed to filter out tests that your Conformance/CapabilityStatement (depending on the version) doesn't support. We're in the middle of updating our STU3 code for v1.8 though, so there is that caveat. I've created an issue on Github https://github.com/fhir-crucible/crucible/issues/207
It'd help if you added some information (at least your server URL) to the github issue. That will help us debug. Thanks!
